issue.title: [Python] pandas/feather tests failing on pandas master
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7527](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7527). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because I merged a PR in pandas to support Period dtype, some tests in pyarrow are now failing (they were using period dtype to test "unsupported" dtypes)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7527?focusedCommentId=17011971) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6147
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6147>
